projects.title: Custom Memory Allocator
projects.description: A high-performance memory allocator written in C++ designed for embedded systems with limited resources.
projects.details:
This project implements a custom memory allocator that outperforms standard malloc/free in specific scenarios. It uses a segregated free list approach and supports custom alignment. Key features include: 
- O(1) allocation and deallocation for fixed-size blocks.
- Low fragmentation overhead.
- Thread-safe implementation using atomic operations.
